From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To change the flow control start character for the current session, use the **terminal start-character** command in EXEC mode.

ParaDef.Info: ASCII decimal representation of the start character.

Examples: The following example changes the start character to Ctrl-O (ASCII decimal character 15):
ExtraInfo: The flow control start character signals the start of data transmission when software flow control is in effect.

RelatedCmds.description: Sets the flow control start character.
